org.intermine.configurator

Class MineConfigManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.configurator.MineConfigManager

  • public class MineConfigManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all the interaction with the database and user-config previously created.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(MineUserConfigRepository repository,
                       java.util.UUID mineId,
                       java.util.UUID userId)
        checks if this combo of user and mine is in our database
        Parameters:
        mineId - UUID for user
        userId - UUID for mine
        Returns:
        TRUE if valid combo

      • addMineConfig

        public void addMineConfig(MineUserConfigRepository repository,
                          java.util.UUID mineId,
                          java.util.UUID userId)
        Adds a record to the database with this mineId and userId. Does not check if that mineId+userId is already present, so will overwrite current entries.
        Parameters:
        repository - link to database
        mineId - UUID for this mine
        userId - UUID for this user

      • getMineConfig

        public MineUserConfig getMineConfig(MineUserConfigRepository repository,
                                    java.util.UUID mineId)
        Returns mine (user) config for given IDs. Returns NULL if not found in the database.
        Parameters:
        repository - link to database
        mineId - UUID for this mine
        Returns:
        config associated with this mine

      • removeConfig

        public boolean removeConfig(MineUserConfigRepository repository,
                            java.util.UUID mineId)
        Destroy the associated config for mine
        Parameters:
        repository - link to database
        mineId - id of mine
        Returns:
        TRUE if operation successful, FALSE is mineId/userId not found

      • getMineDescriptor

        public MineDescriptor getMineDescriptor(MineUserConfigRepository repository,
                                        java.util.UUID mineId)
        Get the descriptors, e.g. mine name, for the mine with the ID provided. Might be NULL if it doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        repository - link to database
        mineId - id of mine
        Returns:
        descriptors associated with this mine

      • setMineDescriptor

        public void setMineDescriptor(MineUserConfigRepository repository,
                              java.util.UUID mineId,
                              MineDescriptor descriptor)
        Sets the descriptors, e.g. mine name, for the mine with the ID provided. Overwrites any previously set mine descriptors.
        Parameters:
        repository - link to database
        mineId - id of mine

                                        java.util.UUID mineId,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> sourceNames)
        Sets the supplementary sources to be loaded into this mine. Overwrites any previously set values.
        Parameters:
        repository - link to database
        mineId - id of mine
        sourceNames - list of sources to add
